languages.text: "Слова бессильного! Я должна... должна избавить его от мук! Должен быть способ!"
"Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"
languages.original_text: "Слова бессильного! Я должна... должна избавить его от мук! Должен быть способ!"

traits.locale_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sont des paroles dignes d'{mf|un|une} lâche ! Je dois... je dois le libérer de ses tourments ! Il doit y avoir un moyen ! »
languages.original_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des paroles dignes d'{mf|un|une} lâche ! Je dois... je dois le libérer de ses tourments ! Il doit y avoir un moyen ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “只有无能为力的人才会说出这样的话！我必须……我一定要把他解救出来！肯定会有办法！”
languages.original_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"

traits.locale_text: “只有无能为力的人才会说出这样的话！我必须……我一定要把他解救出来！肯定会有办法！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「それは無力な者の言葉だ！私は…彼をこの苦しみから解放しなければならない！何か方法があるはずだ！」
languages.original_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"

traits.locale_text: 「それは無力な者の言葉だ！私は…彼をこの苦しみから解放しなければならない！何か方法があるはずだ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Nur wer schwach ist, spricht so! Ich muss ... Ich muss ihn vor dieser Qual retten! Es muss einen Weg geben!"
languages.original_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"

traits.locale_text: "Nur wer schwach ist, spricht so! Ich muss ... Ich muss ihn vor dieser Qual retten! Es muss einen Weg geben!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Así solo hablan los desvalidos! ¡Debo... tengo que liberarlo de su tormento! ¡Tiene que haber un modo!».
languages.original_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Así solo hablan los desvalidos! ¡Debo... tengo que liberarlo de su tormento! ¡Tiene que haber un modo!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Zayıflar gibi konuşuyorsun! Hayır... Onu bu azaptan kurtarmak zorundayım! Bir yolu olmalı!"
languages.original_text: "Those are the words of the powerless! I must... I have to free him from this torment! There has to be a way!"

traits.locale_text: "Zayıflar gibi konuşuyorsun! Zorundayım… Onu bu azaptan kurtarmak zorundayım! Bir yolu olmalı!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
